Summary: UAT US DS3 - Cumulative Quantity
Description: We created an order of 100yards in command  after dispatching 2 loads of 10yards each  we realized the EPOD of each one are showing the CUMULATIVE QUANTITY as 0  and should display 10  20...    Steps to reproduce:  1. create an order in command (this order should have 50 yards at least)  2.  Dispatch the order  3. Take 3 loads in driver app (move all the loads in driver app to the last status and sign them)  4. at the and  retrieve the EPOD of each one and look for the cumulative quantity.    Expected result: The amount displayed should be different to 0.

Look for the notes   Actual state: The notes are not displayed  Expected: see the notes displayed

Dispatch the order 3. Take the load in driver app 4. The app would show ticket does not exist  Actual state: unavailability to take tickets when the order is different than just numbers and when the dispatch adds 2 notes.  Expected: process the ticket in the driver app

Summary: UAT ES DS3 Errors in Doc 27 and Doc 03
Description: Version: Driver 1.7.0.4    Client:  Jobsite: 65422282  When we try to upload a ticket after being produced  the pre-ticket that is showed is the Nº 27  but when HTC finishes the production it sent the doc Nº 03 and the issue is that in Driver app Mobile stills shows the Nº 27 instead of the 03. The only way to force the change is to revoke the ticket and upload it again.   This bug occurs with Jobsites Paperless or not. Consider this scenario if HTC has a delay in sending the doc to Azure.  Step To reproduce:  # Create a ticket in RMS # Sent it to HTC # Do not end the production in HTC # Upload the ticket in DriverAPP mobile. # Go to Information  See Delivery Ticket. # Ticket displayed Nº 27. When the fabrication is done in HTC the Doc 03 is available  but in DriverAPP still has the Doc 27. # The only way is to change the ticket after HTC send the Doc 03 is revoking the ticket and uploading it again.

Summary: UAT US DS3 - Project Number is incorrect

Summary: The epod is not being attached to the SAP reference
Description: When a delivery is scanned in the driver app  the trip is signed and closed  the generated ePOD must be sent to SAP and attached to the delivery document and this is not happening.    User Stories related:  DCM001CX1244-9801 [MX] - Send EPOD from Azure to SAP [1st Part]  DCM001CX1244-9725[MX][BE] - Send EPOD from Azure to SAP [2nd Part]  DCM001CX1244-9811[MX] - Send EPOD from Azure to SAP [3rd Part]    Reproduction steps:  1. Create an order in SAP  2. Create the delivery and SAP shipment for the order  3. Execute the dispatch process of the delivery in SAP  4. Scan the ticket in Driver App application  5. Advance the status in Driver App application until the last step (ePOD signature)  6. Review the generated ePOD attached to the SAP delivery document in the transaction VL03N entering the Delivery document and click on the "Servicios para Objeto" icon

Summary: The brand logo is not being always displayed in the ePOD
Description: The logotype of the brand is not always being displayed in the ePOD document (see attachment)    Steps to recreate:  1. Create an Order in SAP  2. Execute the planning process for the SAP Order  this step will create the SAP delivery and SAP Shipment document.  3. Execute the dispatch process of the order   4. Scan the delivery ticket in the Driver App solution  5. Enter to the details option and click on "Ver Ticket de entrega" option  6. Check that the logotype is not displayed  only a black square is seeing

Summary: UAT_US_DS3_Labels incorretly shown

Summary: UAT_US_DS3_Label shown in an incorrectly status

Summary: UAT_US_DS3_Review botton does not redirect sometimes to the right place

Expected Result: whenever you click on review  you should be redirected to the web page.    Please reach me or Hector Castro in order to explain you more about this bug.

Summary: UAT PH DS3 - Incorrect status of signature in Track app when status of load is Loading

Create sales order in ZRQ (examples of orders: 21016100  21016201)  2. Dispatch the sales order in ZRQ  status of load in CMX Go is Loading  3. Upload the ticket to Driver app  status of ticket in Driver app is To Jobsite  4. Access the Track app and check the load details    Actual:   The status of load is Loading. Summary: UAT PH DS3 - Load status Finished - incorrect status of Signature
Description: Test user: durawood@mailinator.com  password: Tesxg0 Test environment: [https://qa-eu.cemexgo.com/login|https://qa-eu.cemexgo.com/login] Test customer and jobsite: 50000942  65000881  Steps to replicate:  1. Create sales order (VA01) in ZRQ 2. Dispatch the sales order in ZRQ  complete the statuses or shipment in ZRQ (without upload of ticket to Driver app as it´s not used in PH) 3. Access the Track app to check the delivery&load details 4. Sign the EPOD via Track app  Actual:  The status of load in Track app never reaches "On site". It´s either Loading or Finished.  In case that the status is Finished  the status of Signature is Pending  button appearing is Sign  however the user is not able to submit the signature - there´s internal server error appearing  see attached images (I am not able to upload video).  Expected:  1. The status of load needs to be "On site" in order to be able to sign the Epod via Track app.  2. In case that the status of load is "Finished"  the status of signature cannot be Pending and button Sign shall not be appearing.

Summary: UAT PH DS3 - Receiving person field - 100 characters are not displayed in EPOD

There´s no counter of characters in field Receiving person. It´s difficult to estimate the 100 characters.   2. There are not all 100 allowed characters replicated in pdf file of EPOD. Summary: UAT_US_DS3_EPOD NO COD displays amounts
Description: Actual: Created the following EPOD NO COD and it is showing amounts (images attach)    Info:   CustomerID: 3101088  Order: 8008  Date: May 18th  2020  Load 1  Ticket: 28970322    Expected: Per definition  when the EPOD belongs to Credit Customers  no amounts should be displayed.     **PS: this is what the Yellow story mentions about this:  To display Pricing Information (Unit Price  Amount) in ePOD the rule will be:  Cash customers = True  then show pricing info in ePOD and also show the pricing at the list of line item level  Cash customers = False   then don't show pricing info in ePOD neither pricing at line item level  (See "Cash Customers Scenarios" attachment for guidance)    Note: Cash Customer = (Credit Code = CSH)  *If it has “CSH” for at least one company  it is consider Cash Customer    NOTE: Even though the customer is paperless or not paperless  the flow will be the same.

Summary: UAT UK DS3 When driver revokes ticket after arriving at site the status in Track shows as finished.
Description: *Data:*  Driver v1.8.4.1  Track Web  Track Android v3.14.1.3  Track IOS v2.25.0.6  paperlessGBRMX@yopmail.com  Cemex2020  JN Bentley 50211965  Whitby  Church Street  Ticket: 214741848    *Steps to Reproduce:*  Driver arrives at site and begins unloading. The Scenario tested is that the load is rejected due to technical issues (too wet etc…) and driver needs to return the load to the plant.   Driver revokes the ticket in Driver App and once truck returns to plant the batcher needs to process the return in HTC.   Once the return in HTC is processed the status of the load in Track still shows as “finished” which indicates to the user that the load was delivered and unloaded. This may cause confusion when calculating final quantity delivered especially if the customer is paperless as they will be relying on track to monitor quantities.   *  Actual Behaviour:*  When driver revokes ticket and batcher has returned load in HTCthe statuses in track still show as finished and quantity is taken into account in delivered volumes. Customer can also still sign for ticket in track.    *Expected Behaviour:*  When driver has revoked ticket and batcher has returned load in HTC track should have another stated indicating that the load has been returned/revoked. This quantity should not be taken into account in the dispatched quantity in track and the customer should not be able to sign in track  In addition to the above the customer can still sign the revoked ticket in track app . If the ticket still shows as finished this may be signed in error for any future loads as the user cannot differentiate between the revoked load and the next load.    *Evidence:*      Also  the load is taken into account in the delivered quantity progress bar and order report in track.

Summary: MX DS2 Hora requerida incorrecta en modificación
Description: * Cliente tiene un pedido confirmado  * Solicita en OLS una modificación  * Coloca una nueva hora requerida y OLS hace una contrapropuesta  * El cliente acepta la hora propuesta  * En RMS aparece la misma hora de entrega y requerida    Resultado esperado: Muestre en el campo la hora requerida por el cliente al solicitar la modificación    Ejemplo:  * Pedido 8009926715 nuevo desde OLS programado a las 12 hrs requerido y con disponibilidad a misma hr   * Modificación para misma fecha pero a las 7 am por solicitud de cliente. Al validar disponibilidad no hay dicho horario  arroja 9 am horario mas cercano al requerido.- cliente acepta dicho horario 9 am y se acepta pedido.  * Lo correcto es que en requerido asigne 7 am ya que era la nueva hr requerida por el cliente en la modificación.  *   !image-2020-08-25-12-00-10-078.png|thumbnail!

Summary: MX DS2 Eliminar Reanudar pedido en Reserva Anticipada
Description: Al solicitar un pedido internamente se crea con estatus de Reserva Anticipada  En los call actions en Historial de Pedidos aparece la opción de Continuar con el pedido debido a que aparece con estatus En Espera    No debe estar el call action de Continuar con el pedido    Ejemplo:  * Pedido 8009926715 se modifica producto el cual aparece reserva anticipada en RMX y en OLS “En espera”  * A este pedido en OLS aparecen las opciones de “Continuar con orden” y “Repetir pedido”     !image-2020-08-25-12-19-25-705.png|thumbnail!

Summary: MX DS2 Falla en modificacion de Pedido en Proceso sin cargas pendientes.

Ejemplo:  Pedido 8009926722 si permitio reducir el volumen siendo que la carga esta en proceso.     !image-2020-08-25-12-57-10-175.png|thumbnail!

Summary: MX DS2 Error en fecha al crear pedido despues de las 7pm
Description: Al generar un pedido despues de las 7 pm e ingresar el producto  volumen  contrato  adiciones  el perfil del proyecto (Tipo de descarga  elemento a colar  frecuencia y tiempo de descarga) la fecha que aparece antes de indicar la fecha/hora requerida es del dia siguiente.     !image-2020-08-25-21-45-43-316.png|thumbnail!     Al dejar la fecha en el dia siguiente y seleccionar la hora solicitada  hacemos clic en consultar y en el calendario hidrido aparecen los horarios disponibles pero de 2 dias despues de la fecha actual.     !image-2020-08-25-21-47-40-160.png|thumbnail!     Resultado esperado: que la fecha para crear el pedido sea de pasado mañana (2 dias)  Resultado actual: la fecha solicitada se queda al dia siguiente.

Summary: UAT UK DS3 - UK Paperless Testing – Redirected load – Error 145
Description: *Data:*  Driver App v1.8.5.11  Initial Ticket: 214747299  Redirect Ticket: 214747302  *Steps to Reproduce:*  # 1.Add original ticket to driver app (214747299) 2.Arrive at jobsite (status automatically updated to “on site” after approx 3 mins once geofence hit) 3.Customer rejects load 4.Redirect processed in SAP/RMS 5.Original ticket is completed in driver app with notes to confirm redirect 6.Press “add” in driver app 7.Ticket DID NOT automatically pull (same truck so should have) 8.Once completed add ticket for redirection manually (214747302) 9.Error 145 message appeared Could not pull the second load onto the driver app (Tony Connolly confirmed that status was “to site” in SAP)  {color:#d04437}*Actual behavior:*{color} “add” button did not pull ticket automatically. Error 145 message when tried to pull manually  {color:#14892c}*Expected behavior:*{color} When the 1^st^ ticket is completed the driver should press “add” in driver app and the next ticket should pull automatically for the redirection. Failing this the driver should be able to pull ticket manually by entering the sap delivery number. This also failed.  *Evidence:*  !image-20200901-111642.png|width=905 height=509!  !image-20200901-111655.png|width=461 height=736!

Summary: UAT UK DS3 - UK Paperless Testing – Redirected load – Error 145
Description: *Data:*  Driver App v1.8.5.11  Initial Ticket: 214747410  Redirect Ticket: 214747423  *Steps to Reproduce:*  1.Add original ticket to driver app (214747410)  2.Arrive at jobsite (status automatically updated to “on site” after approx 3 mins once geofence hit)  3.Customer rejects load  4.Driver completes ticket in Driver App (adding notes)  5.Driver then returned to plant  6.Batcher processed redirect and truck had material added  7.Driver then tried to “add ticket”  8.Error message Reason Code 145  {color:#d04437}*Actual behavior:*{color} “add” button did not pull ticket automatically. Error 145 message when tried to pull manually  {color:#14892c}*Expected behavior:*{color} When the 1^st^ ticket is completed the driver should press “add” in driver app and the next ticket should pull automatically for the redirection. Summary: CX024GO2005-9 - Log out from select jobsites view
Description: There is not option to  log out from jobsite screen view  you must select a jobsite and then log off Or by forcing to close the aplication with X Both phones Android / IOS  ----  Expected behaviors:  * Scenario 1: *User with no jobsites assigned* in “Select jobsite” screen ** User sees empty state with LOGOUT call to action button ** User clicks Logout ** Dialog box pops up to confirm if he/she wants to log out *** User clicks confirm - App logs out and goes to login screen *** User clicks cancel - Dialog box closes and user sees empty screen ** If user clicks back button/gesture in mobile device *** app goes to background   *** user goes to his/her home screen *** user stays logged in  * Scenario 2: *User with jobsites assigned* in “Select jobsite” screen ** User sees list of jobsites ** If user clicks back button in mobile  *** app goes to background   *** user goes to his/her home screen ** If user want to log out  he/she needs to  *** go to the Orders screen   *** click on the hamburger menu icon   *** click logout option

Summary: MX DS2 Trigger para DCO al cambio de fecha
Description: De acuerdo a la historia DCM008CX1295-16493 si el cliente elige una opción de fecha y hora que no está disponible te lo manda a RMS como pendiente de confirmar  pero como le da la opción de volver a elegir fecha y hora pudiera ser el caso de que esa nueva solicitud si esté disponible para que se genere online pero ya no es posible debido a que no vuelve a consultar el DCO y se va como pendiente por confirmar de cualquier manera    Usuario: ferreterachamizaluser@mailinator.com  Cliente: CONSTRUCTORA VILLA DEL PALMAR    1. Se Selecciona una fecha y hora que no tiene disponible DCO  2. Te muestra un mensaje de que se va a ir por confirmar  3. Te da la opción de volver a elegir fecha y hora  4. Seleccionas una opción que si sea disponible por DCO pero de cualquier manera se va por request

Summary: In Orders View the days of the week are wrong
Description: When the user is browsing the list of orders  some of the headings for the days in the list show the incorrect name of the week (also the day marked "_Today_" is incorrect). This seems to happen only to days where there are no orders. The day for today is shown in bold correctly  but shows the weekday wrong (for example if today is Thursday October 22nd  it shows _Wednesday_ instead of showing _Today_).  For example for October 18  2020  the day is shown as "_Saturday 18  2020_" instead of "_Sunday 18  2020_"  Tested in Hebrew with user shatit@mailinator.com and in English with user blazona.da.test@mailinator.com and the language/country presents the same problem.  The time zone does seem to matter. The problem appears in time zone GMT-5 (Monterrey   Mexico)  but for time zone GMT+3 (Jerusalem  Israel) the issue doesn't seem to occur.    Time zone configurations: for Mexico’s timezone at 17:xx pm ({{wongday_timezone Mexico.png}}) and for Israel 1:xx am of the next day ({{wrongday timezone Israel.png}})   !wongday_timezone Mexico.png|width=41.666666666666664%!  !wrongday timezone Israel.png|width=41.666666666666664%!    we see that days w/o orders show the wrong name of the week but on days with orders it seems to be ok ({{wrongday_en_us capA days with orders are ok  empty days wrong timezone MX.png}})  in IL time zone it looks ok ({{wrongday_en_us capA days with orders are ok  empty too timezone IL.png}}). This is for user [blazona.da.test@mailinator.com|mailto:blazona.da.test@mailinator.com] in United States.  !wrongday_en_us capA days with orders are ok  empty days wrong timezone MX.png|width=50%!  !wrongday_en_us capA days with orders are ok  empty too timezone IL.png|width=50%!    Also  the label for today’s date is wrong ({{wrongday_en_us capB empty week desfazado 1 dia today equivocado timezone MX.png}})  in Israel’s time zone it looks ok ({{wrongday_en_us capB empty week desfazado 0 dia today ok timezone IL.png}})  !wrongday_en_us capB empty week desfazado 1 dia today equivocado timezone MX.png|width=50%!  !wrongday_en_us capB empty week desfazado 0 dia today ok timezone IL.png|width=50%!    In the following screenshot we see that if we log in with a user from Israel (and the UI switches to Hebrew) for October 20 the label is שני like it is for October 19 and it should be שלישי. Also  when the today date is Thursday October 22  on that line it should say zToday but instead it shows רביעי (Wednesday) ({{wrongday_he_il capC 18oct selected  timezone-MX.png}}). Compared in Israel’s time zone ({{wrongday_he_il capC 18oct selected  timezone-IL (today changed to Friday  since it's the next day there  1_19 am).png}})  !wrongday_he_il capC 18oct selected  timezone-MX.png|width=50%!  !wrongday_he_il capC 18oct selected  timezone-IL (today changed to Friday  since it's the next day there  1_19 am).png|width=50%!      For days with orders here’s comparison between Mexico’s time zone ({{wrongday_he_il capE jamishi repeated for 15 and 16 timezone MX.png}}) and Israel’s time zone ({{wrongday_he_il capE jamishi repeated for 15 and 16 timezone IL.png}}). Note that the days with orders looks ok  but that October 16 is empty and in Mexico’s time zone the day is shown as חמישי but it should be שישי like in Israel’s timezone.  !wrongday_he_il capE jamishi repeated for 15 and 16 timezone MX.png|width=50%!  !wrongday_he_il capE jamishi repeated for 15 and 16 timezone IL.png|width=50%!

Summary: Order Status not updated on detail
Description: When the user selects an order to see its detail  and the order status is in a status <statusA>  and go back to the orders list view and the order change its status to a next status <statusB>. After refreshing the list  the order status its updated to the <statusB>  but the user checks de order detail again  the status of the order remains as <statusA>.    Steps to reproduce:  Create an order in SIMMA  verify its shown in calendar orders view as confirmed.  Open the order details and verify its shown as confirmed.  Batch the order in SIMMA and wait for it to be integrated and processed by onminchannel to sync the order status.  Return to the calendar orders view and verify the order is now In Progress.  Open the order detail again and verify the status.    Actual Result:  The Order remains in status Confirmed.    Expected Result:   The order should be shown in the new status In Progress as it is in calendar orders view.     !image-2020-11-05-10-13-03-336.png|thumbnail!      !image-2020-11-05-10-13-50-689.png|thumbnail!

Summary: OLS-S2-Tiempo de ciclo de bombeo no se está calculando correctamente
Description: Al capturar un pedido con Bomba no se está calculando correctamente el ciclo de bombeo a)si esta bien el calculo de los 70 mins segun los datos leidos de los parametros.. b) 10 tubos... * 5 mins cada uno = 50 mins + 20 de promedio de instalación de la bomba. c) inicio de bombeo es a las 9 am  y dice que la bomba inicia su cilclo a las 8:10  + 70 mins que tiene que llegar antes para instalarse... debería ser 7:50 am y aparte el trayecto de donde sale la bomba  a la obra  Pasos para reproducir:  # Entrar a Cemex Go OLS con su usuario y contraseña # Seleccionar la opción de Crear Pedido # Capturar la información requerida del frente de entrega y contrato # Capturar la información del pedido incluyendo tuberias y mangueras (10 de c/u) # Grabar el pedido  # Revisar la hora de inicio de ocupación de bomba en SAP # Ver pantalla anexas

Summary: PP - API Calendartypes error 400
Description: The API [https://pp.cemexgo.com/api/v4/cum/customers/calendartypes|https://pp.cemexgo.com/api/v4/cum/customers/calendartypes] had a 400 error.That value is need it to determine the calendar type for customer if we do not receive any response the flow changes to the Request experience instead the online. That defect is blocking the Adjustment for cash orders functionality to be tested by the RMX operation.  \{ "httpCode": "400"  "httpMessage": "BadRequest"  "reasonCode": "51000"  "moreInformation": null }  So far the diagnostic is the the applicationid received are marked as MRP500 instead MR3500. That API has an orchestration from the Partners API (/v1/rm/otf/partners)  from RMX.

Summary: Delay in statuses
Description: I created the first order for 3 M3. It worked ok…. But the statues were in a delay    And then I created an order for 25 M3.  Order 276166  The first delivery supposed to be on 7 M3  So when I started the loading the statues haven’t change. Then I change the status in Simma – to left the plant.  The status in the app still – approved  (see Image 1)     When I added time to site arrival  That's what is happening.  We have 1 order for 25 m3 that is in status approved.  And then we see another order – the same number (I think it's the problem with the 12 digit…) that it's in process..    (see Image 2)     When I change the statues in Simma to start unloading   (see Image 3)  That's what I see in the app:  Complete without volume:      (see Image 4+5)  When I add time in Simma for end loading end leaving the plant – the info in the app hasn't changed (and there is a problem with the marked word that's supposed to be in the same line…)     (see Image 6)  I have tried another order when I choose the correct order number in the console  In Simma the truck finish loading – the statues in the app – still approved  it took a few minutes to the statues to change to in progress…  In Simma it's already left the plant   (see Image 7)  in the app it took couple of minutes and some refreshing of the page to see the change in the statues

Summary: PL DS3 Wrong status of the AGG Loads (OTF)
Description: [https://qa-eu.cemexgo.com/login|https://qa-eu.cemexgo.com/login] test.agg@mailinator.com  Cemex2021\!  Wrong statuses of Loads are being shown in Track. Some of them appear in status “On Route”  some in status “Finished”.  !image-2021-05-20-14-50-50-074.png|width=200 height=183!  Here is an example of a Load (227946930)  which was dispatched  so the status changed to "Loading" at 10:31 and then it was immediately changed to "On Route":  !image-2021-05-20-14-35-09-498.png|width=200 height=183!  This can happen if the same truck is being used for several deliveries at the same time. [~accountid:5a6ae6a1187efa232b09df1a] helped me to analyze the issue:  “As requested below are the records I could find from CRQ relating to the load raised by Lukasz. I hope this helps in your identification of the Bug reported.   Order              0227946930 Delivery           0227946958 Shipment        0122846592    Load dispatched on 18.05.2021 at 10:31:22 local time  My check in SAP shows the following:  Record of the dispatch which you can see is the last one for this vehicle – nothing has been dispatched since using it.  !1.jpg|width=200 height=183!  Messages from CRQ have all been created correctly and no errors reported on integration to Azure – BTW there are many more messages for this order compared to the one we did earlier as this has deliveries created for the multiple items in the order.  I have highlighted the relevant message updating the Shipment confirming dispatch which I understand will update Azure to “Loading” status.  !2.jpg|width=200 height=183!  The result in the Track console is shown below as Lukasz has provided – it seems there is another load from the same order with the same issue (delivery 227946957).   The other loads are Finished – presumably because those vehicles have been re-used on other jobs.  !3.jpg|width=200 height=183!  By comparison below are the messages generated for the order / delivery / shipment that you observed during our call which resulted in a successful integration to Azure and the load status set correctly as “Loading”.   Order              0227947086 Delivery           0227947091 Shipment        0122846636  !4.jpg|width=200 height=183!  The result was a successful integration and correct status for the load.  !5.jpg|width=200 height=183!  I hope this helps.”

Summary: UK UATS DS3 Drivers App - RMX - Incorrect truck dispatched on and needs changing.
Description: When testing this scenario  once production has commenced  the ability to change the fleet number in the ‘Deliveries Maintenance Report’ can only be done once production is complete. If done  the process will replace the fleet number of the delivery to the new requested one and complete the service returning both vehicles to be available at the plant but also complete the affected delivery in SAP. The Driver can assign the now changed delivery to their tablet  but the Dispatch Console used by Batchers and Shippers will no longer display delivery status’s or waiting time from the tablet.    Driver app 1.8.8.14.   Customer Account 50219878.  Sap delivery number 227946618.  Dispatched on Truck registration PO67VOA.  Changed in Delivery Maintenance Report to truck registration PO67VJL.  Books the truck back to the plant.  The ticket populated onto the tablet and ran through correctly.  But the Dispatch Console used by Batchers and Shippers will no longer display delivery status’s or waiting time from the tablet.  Expected behaviour the truck registration to change and be able to be tracked by both the Cemexgo system and Batchers and Shippers as well as to populate the waiting times on the dispatch console.    Actual behaviour the truck registration changed and be able to tracked by both Cemexgo system and the Batchers and shippers dispatch console and for it to include the waitings times in the waiting time report.     !image-2021-05-20-16-21-53-536.png|thumbnail!    !image-2021-05-20-16-41-58-870.png|thumbnail!    !image-2021-05-20-16-42-42-237.png|thumbnail!

Summary: [RMS][MX] Back and finish buttons do not get enabled when the user clicks finish after modifying an order.
Description: 2 Issues will be fixed here. 1- When the user  has a product with only one VAP and he modifies the order and selects a product enabled with more than 1 value added  the subsequent value add drop down does not get enabled. 2- If the user modifies an order and before finishing the order clicks back and modifies more values and after that tries to finish the order  the buttons back and finish get disabled and the application does not respond  the only option is to cancel    Order 8009940616  Evidence Issue 1  !value added not loaded.mp4|thumbnail!    Issue 2  !image-2021-06-03-11-12-11-835.png|width=200 height=183!   Steps  1- In a confirmed order (8009940616) go to modify  2- Change product  quantity and other values  3- Verify dates and go to the summary.  4- Click back  5- do more changes on the order and verify dates.  6- Go to the summary and submit the modification.  7- The screen remains on that step and Finish and back buttons get disabled.

Summary: UAT FR DS3 - The driver can't scan the barcode
Description: When a driver want to scan the barcode of the ePOD  it doesn't work. The driver have access to the ePOD only when s/he writtes the ePOD number.    Steps :     1- Open Driver App  2- Add a new POD  3- Try to scan the barcode     Tested with 2 different devices and 2 different POD and we have the same behavior    Version : 1.8.8.17    Expected behaviour : be able to scan the barcode

Summary: UAT FR DS3 - The hours on the ePOD are wrong
Description: The hours on the ePOD are not the correct ones. On the example attached  the driver has completed 15h22 on Driver App but on the ePOD it is 14h22.     Steps to reproduce :    1- Create an POD with OTF  2- Use the Driver App to complete the ePOD  3- Complete the hours  4- Share the ePOD by email  5- Open the link from the email  6- Check if the hours on the ePOD are correct    Expected behaviour : have the same hours on the ePOD than the ones completed by the driver  Actual behaviour : wrong hours on the ePOD

Summary: UAT FR DS3 - Translation missing

Summary: UAT UK DS3 - No HTC Ticket when completed in Driver App (paperless flag off)
Description: SAP Delivery Number: 227951632  Customer: 50212224  Jobsite: 70143186  Driver: V1.8.8.17  Track App: Android v3.14.4.4  iOS v2.30.20    Jobsite has paperless flagged not ticked.     Pre-ePOD showing as HTC ticket once added to driver app. Showing on all platforms.    Once ticket has been completed in Driver App  the ePOD reverts back to the Driver ePOD  not HTC. This is then the same in all platforms.     Steps:   1. Add delivery number to driver app 227951632  2. Info-->View Delivery Ticket  HTC ticket showing correctly  3. To Jobsite-->Complete times for Onsite  Unload Start  Unload End  4. Complete fields in Extras  5. Complete fields in Driver notes  6. Add signee and complete all fields and submit  7. Next--> Details and Notes-->Add customer notes  8. Send without signature  9. History--> info-->View Delivery Ticket  10. Driver epod visible  not HTC document  11. Driver epod visible in all consoles  not HTC  12. Signature signed in Android track app  13. Still driver app epod visible in all consoles (with signature)    Actual Behaviour: No HTC ticket once driver app is completed    Expected Behaviour: HTC ticket should be available in all consoles and driver app  once completed [^Pre-epod.PDF]  [^Signed epod.pdf]

Summary: QA - RecurrentOrders_IL Pull down refresh in ReadyMix Go app
Description: QA - RecurrentOrders_IL Pull down refresh in ReadyMix Go app     Please note this issue a not a user specific so any user can be used   construction@mailinator.com  Cemex2020    *Steps*  Login with the above user  Select any jobsite with order  Go to Calendar view  Pull down the orders and refresh circle will appear just below the week/dates of the calendar  Pull down again and refresh will not work again and it will pull down the whole of the app    *Expected Behaviour*  Pull down should work when user pulls down the app in Calendar view.

Summary: QA - OnlineSimma_IL Back button doesn't refresh the app in ReadyMix Go app
Description: QA - OnlineSimma_IL Back button doesn't refresh the app in the ReadyMix Go app    *Data*  construction@mailinator.com  Cemex2020  0065206497    *Steps*  Login to the app using the above credentials  Create an order using Jobsite 0065206497  Go to SIMMA and change the quantity of the material and save  Go to the app and go to the *Order details screen*  The changed qty can be seen in order details screen   Press the Back button at the top left corner to go to the Calendar view  Qty of the order hasn't been changed in the Calendar view  Now refresh the screen by tapping on the date  Qty has changed in the Calendar view too    *Expected Behaviour*  The *Back* button should refresh the Calendar view screen    *Please Note:* This behaviour of the app is noticeable not only in the change of the qty but also the change of delivery statuses i.e.  when a user goes in the order details screen or the Loads screen  delivery statuses have been updated but going back to Calendar view screen using *Back* button delivery statuses are not updated in the Calendar view screen.

Summary: QA - OnlineSimma_IL  SIMMA order number visible during Pending status of an order
Description: QA - OnlineSimma_IL  SIMMA order number visible during Pending status of an order    *Data*  construction@mailinator.com  Cemex2020  jobsite 0065440417    *Steps*  Create an order using above credentials  See the order in CX Web or ReadyMix Go app  Order is in Pending status  Order has 6 digit SIMMA order number not an Order request number    *Expected Behaviour*  SIMMA order number should appear on the app and CX Go web once the order is *Confirmed*    Please note: Also an email notification is sent out with an order request when the user places an order NOT SIMMA order number.

Summary: Internal Server Error for delivery day major to 12
Description: The GET API response (/v6/sm/otf/orders/multiple?batches=) is Internal system error (code 500) for documents with delivery day major to 12. For example: June 13th  May 20th  etc.   The date is created automatically using the downloaded excel format from CEMEX Go.    Testing data:  Customer:50025163  Job site: 66840978  User: ferreterachamizaluser@mailinator.com  batches IDs with this error : 114  115  116 and 125    Note: It seems that the API is interpreting the format as mm/dd/yy but the date format in the excel is dd/mm/yy.

Summary: DS2 Order Taking RMS. VAP  doesnt show correct the vap over Mix Concrete
Description: we have a mix concrete that has value added product  as a subitem into the contract CXGO need to show me those value added product into the combos  as a defintion of  user story  ..........................................................................................................................  Description  As a Customer I want to be able to select the value-added products for my concrete mix from the options defined in my contract so that my order is created with a correct and valid mix.      Acceptance Criteria  When the Ready-mix product and contract are selected  the value-added options should be pre-filled with the values available in my contract for that concrete material.  Only the proposed value-added materials from the contract are the ones that can be displayed and selected; a maximum of 4 value-added materials can be included in the mix.  If an additional value-added from the available options is required  that value need to be added to the contract.    If no value added is on contract  there will be no available options to be selected con value-added functionality.    Same logic should be applied to call actions  modify and repeat.    ............................................................

Summary: QA - UK Edit comments in Drivers note and Customer notes deletion of text
Description: QA - UK Edit comments in Drivers note and Customer notes deletion of text     *Description *  In Driver notes and Details and notes (Customer Notes) Modify Comment. When you tap on the screen to add to the comment  the comment disappears  and you have to re-type the whole comment again. In Android  you click on a pencil and you can actually modify the comment or add to it. I believe this should work the same as the android and the comment should stay and be able to be modified/amended.     !image-2021-08-24-11-59-20-292.png|thumbnail!   When you tap on comments section text existed already disappears   !image-2021-08-24-11-59-47-632.png|thumbnail!     *Expected behaviour*  Upon editing the text in comments section  already existing text should remain and editable.

Summary: IL_QA: Default map is not available in background
Description: QA - IL iOS RMX Go App: The default map of the user country is not displayed.  *Data:*  Order number: 277329 Customer number: 50052588 Jobsite: 65569512  Vehicle # 155 DT # 80041411  Vehicle # 156 DT # 80041412  Vehicle # 157 DT # 80041413  *Expected behavior:*  One of the acceptance criteria is from the user story CX024GO2005-2049:  When it is not possible to get the delivery point or display the truck geolocation because no truck has GPS  the default map from the user country is displayed.   *The bug:*  After creating and batching the order and making the loads on route  the default map isn't showing the user country but is blank.

Summary: IL_QA: Wrong message on the map screen
Description: QA - IL iOS RMX Go App: Wrong message on the map screen  While creating an order and batching the loads with no GPS data of the delivery point and trucks on route  the message is not correct in accordance with the user story [https://cemexpmo.atlassian.net/browse/CX024GO2005-2049#icft=CX024GO2005-2049|https://cemexpmo.atlassian.net/browse/CX024GO2005-2049#icft=CX024GO2005-2049|smart-link]    *Data:*  Order number: 277329 Customer number: 50052588 Jobsite: 65569512  *Expected behavior:*   If no truck has GPS  a screen with the load status information is displayed  a screen with the following information for each load is displayed: Load Number  Load Status  Driver Name  Truck Number  Product  Volumen Delivery Number.  * An alert will be displayed at the top of the map screen when no truck has gps information available. The message will say “None of the active trucks has GPS”  *Bug:*   The message is saying "Active loads cannot be tracked/located".

Summary: QA - UK Drivers iOS - Aggregates truck not visible when load completed in delivery tracking console.
Description: iOS Version 1.6.2.12  Driver app device iPAD  Account 50361463 Harsco Metals Group LTD  Jobsite 67848584 Rotherham The Ickles Sheffield Road  Order number 227958888   Delivery number 227958890   Large order Pre load  Truck FP68KYA  Retest  50361463 Harsco Metals Group LTD  67848584 Rotherham The Ickles Sheffield Road  Order number 227958974   Delivery number 227958979   Order type Large order Pre Load   Truck  FP68KYA  Delivery tracking console osplanner21.uk@yopmail.com  Password u47@Gbcxgo    Details: Trucks not visible when returning to plant they disappear from the delivery tracking console when load is completed.    Steps: Set Geofences for plant and jobsite.  Add ticket 227958890 to the tablet  Completed ticket with adding extra information  add signer  driver notes and photos amending one. and details and notes adding notes and photos amending one.  Send Without Signature    Recheck delivery tracking console  Enter truck registration FP68KYA no drop down appears to select truck  When searching the tracking map no truck is visible.    Expected behaviour  When ticket is completed truck should show as an arrow back on the delivery tracking console to indicate the truck is on the way back to plant.     !image-2021-09-22-10-34-10-152.png|thumbnail!    !image-2021-09-22-10-35-24-471.png|thumbnail!

Summary: QA - UK iOS Driver App - Aggregates delivery tracking console truck showing in incorrect place and times auto populated.
Description: Version Driver app 1.6.2.12 Device iPAD Settings driver is always. 50361463 Harsco Metals Group LTD  67848584 Rotherham The Ickles Sheffield Road  Order number 227958974  Delivery number  227959000 Order Type Large order   Truck  FP68KYA Log ins: delivery tracking console  Delivery tracking console [https://qa-deliverytracking-console-eu.cemexgo.com/drivers/login|https://qa-deliverytracking-console-eu.cemexgo.com/drivers/login]  osplanner21.uk@yopmail.com  Password u47@Gbcxgo  CEMEXGo Launchpad [https://qa.cemexgo.com/login|https://qa.cemexgo.com/login]  UKTestaccount21@Yopmail.com  Password Cemex2021\!   Details. This is the second delivery on the truck . Manually add the ticket. Checked the delivery tracking console and the truck was showing but onsite. When checking drivers app the times had automatically set themselves.  Steps completed delivery 227958979 and returned to plant Dispatched second load.  Manually added delivery ticket 227959000 Checked the delivery tracking console the truck was showing onsite but it was still at the plant. Checked the driver iOS app the times had auto populated too. On launchpad (Customer view) status of job is finished.  Checking status times are also different on the delivery tracking console to the driver app.  Expected behaviour:  To be able to add the ticket to the tablet and the delivery tracking console to show the correct place of the truck and for the times not to auto populate to allow this delivery to be able to record the correct times.  !image-2021-09-22-11-13-06-095.png|width=200 height=183!    delivery tracking console truck was not at this position.  !image-2021-09-22-11-13-40-190.png|width=200 height=183!    drivers app where truck was.  !image-2021-09-22-11-14-34-400.png|width=200 height=183!    driver app times auto populated.  !image-2021-09-22-11-16-18-478.png|width=200 height=183!    deliver tracking console times different to driver app times.  !image-2021-09-22-11-17-22-362.png|width=200 height=183!    customer view job status finished.  !image-2021-09-22-11-18-06-440.png|width=200 height=183!    no truck visible but truck had not left the plant.

Summary: QA - UK - Driver's iOS status time stamps on ePOD showing GMT rather BST
Description: QA - UK - Driver's iOS status time stamps on ePOD showing GMT rather BST    *Description*  Delivery status time stamps on ePOD after completing the delivery ticket show the time an hour later than the actual time  which is GMT (Greenwich Mean Time) and not BST (British Standard Time).    *Note* This defect was opened before but was rejected as asignee believed the testing is being carried out outside the UK. This test has been carried out in the UK  all the devices used during the testing are in BST by default.    *Data*  Customer 50221673  Jobsite 70476856  Order 227960415  Ticket/Load 4844141001    ePOD showing wrong time    !image-2021-10-15-01-15-38-387.png|thumbnail! Summary: FR- QA- EPOD in not available in CX GO & Driver's App
Description: EPOD is not downloadable from CX GO- Track and not available in driver's app also after completing the Delivery Ticket in Driver's App for Aggregate business line for the order 2012011634 and Delivery 310760616.    When I click on *"Download EPOD"* in CX GO  I get a pop-up message *EPOD not available. Try Again Later*.  When I check completed/finished delivery ticket in Driver's App History Option   I get the pop-up stating that *Cannot Download Delivery Ticket ( See Screenshot Driver's DT).*  Steps to replicate the issue:   CX GO  1) Create an order & delivery in SAP for Aggregate business line 2) Feed the Delivery Ticket in Driver's App 3) Compete the ticket with required info ( On Site  Unloading Start   Unloading End etc.)  4) Login to CX GO 5) Go to Track -> Cement and Aggregates -> Click on the order  -> Loads -> Click on the ticket -> Click on Download EPOD 6) Pop-up message appears stating *EPOD not available. Try Later *  Driver's App  1) Open the Driver's App (version 1.8.8.18 for Android) 2) Select the country as FR 3) Click on Add 4) Put the ticket number then customer/jobsite number 5) Finish the load after putting the required details ( On Site  Unloading Start   Unloading End etc.) 6) Go to History and click on info for the delivery you want to check  7) Click on View Delivery Ticket   you will see a pop up message  ( Screenshot Driver's DT).   Data :   Paperless Jobsite: Order Number: 2012011634 Delivery Number: 310760616 Plant: J454 Customer: 50508280 Jobsite : 70139561 Material: 10120111 Plate: ER243BL User:  gebat@mailinator.com Password: Tesxg0

Summary: UK-CEM-QA- Load statuses are not being updated in the Track App
Description: Load statuses are not being updated in the Track App when its changed in the Driver App (stuck on the “ On route” status)  *Steps to replicate the issue:*  * Create a delivery ticket for CEM business line * Put the delivery ticket number and customer/jobsite number in the Driver app * Check the Load in the Track App  the status has been changed to “On route”  * Go to the Driver App and click on NEXT (delivery process) button to change the status to the next one manually * Check the Load in the Track App  the status has not been changed and stayed on the “On route”  * Go to the Driver App and change the status to the next one - Unloading Start  * The status in the Track App is still “On route” and not being changed to the next ones * Finish the ticket in the Driver App * Status of the Load is still “On route” in the Track App  After finishing the Load in the Driver App I checked the Track App and the status of the Load was still “On route” for 419 minutes (Screenshot UK Track3)  *Data:*  *Order- 0227961244* *Customer- 50517700* *Jobsite- 69638357* *Delivery Ticket - 227961245* *User - hhc@mailinator.com* *Pass-TestGBcxg0*

Summary: FR- RMX- QA- Sign Option Not available on Track App & Load statuses are not synced with driver's app in Track App and CX GO
Description: I do not see any sign option in Track App for FR. I put the delivery ticket details in Driver's app. Selected the time (On site  Unloading Start  Unloading End) and checked the Track After every step. I do not see sign option in Track App. I did not see the sign option even after completing the load in Driver's app.  After completing the load I checked the Track app and CX GO  EPOD is available on both the platforms with Driver's app sign. But the load status are not same.  *Steps to reproduce the issue:*  1) Create an RMX order and delivery ticket 2) Put the delivery ticket details in driver's app 3) Login to track app 4) Put the time (On site  Unloading Start  Unloading End) in driver's app 5) Check the Track App for sign option after every status (On site  Unloading Start  Unloading End) you select in driver's app. You do not see the sign option in driver's app 6) Finish the load in driver's app and check the track app for sign option. You do not see any sign option 7) Download the EPOD from CX GO  Track App. You see the EPOD is generated with the sign from driver's app 8) Check the load status in Track App and CX GO. The status is still Loading in both Track App and CX GO.  *DATA:*  *Order - 1009812337*  *Customer- 50380109* *Jobsite - 81494383* *DT- 210012337  210012338* *User- uat.fr01@mailinator.com* *Password- Cemex2020*

Summary: UK_QA_UATs_Android Driver_Note Duplications
Description: Driver Android v1.8.8.19    Description: When inputting customer and driver notes in the driver app we are seeing some duplications and inconsistencies in the recording of the information between driver app  delivery tracking console  track app/web and the ePOD.    Steps to replicate: 1) Add ticket to driver app 2) set status times "on site"  "Unloading"  "Unloading End" 3) Add 5 notes in Driver notes including photos from camera and library and amending a note. 4) Add notes in "Products and Notes" (same method used for driver notes). 5) complete ticket    Actual Results:   Delivery Ticket 227962077  Customer 50361463  Jobsite 67848584   Truck FP68YGL  1) Driver notes recorded correctly  2) Customer notes contained duplications  3) Note 1 was amended. The amendment created a new note and didn't replace the original  4) Note 5 duplicated after original deleted    Ticket 227962159 50361463 67848584 FP68KYS  1) Driver notes contained duplications (visible in delivery tracking console  note 5)     !image-2021-11-11-11-17-30-251.png|thumbnail!  !image-2021-11-11-11-18-29-389.png|thumbnail!

Summary: [Command] Fields get overwritten when orger gets in to be confirmed by command
Description: When the order gets the status of "to be confirmed" once is created in command. Some fields get overwritten and some do not appear in the request console  * Special Instructions: Special instructions are overwritten when the order is replicated from command  * Unload time: was not originally captured. Refer to screenshot2  * In the order taking request console  the unload type and submitted by is not displayed in the preview of the order  Refer to screenshot3.  * Clean up  if it was checked at the moment the order gets confirmed the field is unchecked.  Evidence  Original order Screenshot1  !image-2021-11-12-00-24-59-212.png|width=200 height=183!    Order in to be confirmed  Screenshot2  !image-2021-11-12-00-26-00-081.png|width=200 height=183!  Order in order taking console Screenshot3  !image-20211112-174609.png|width=1816 height=775!       Steps 1- Create an order  add special instructions and additional comments in product. 2- Take screenshot of values captured 3- Wait for order to get to be confirmed status. Take screenshot and compare it.  4- Check the order taking request console  open the preview and submitted by and unload type are blank.
